thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Scientific Splendor: ‘The Art of Science’

author: Alexandra Wolfe
title: Scientific Splendor: ‘The Art of Science’
text:
Princeton University’s “Art of Science” competition and exhibit, in its eighth year, showcases striking images made in the course of scientific research. Open to the school’s students, faculty, alumni and staff, contestants can use scientific tools and techniques, or merely sketch or photograph objects related to the field. Co-organizer Jasmin Imran Alsous says, “The images look truly beautiful, even if you don’t know what you’re looking at.”
...
